sentences.en: He spent three years in a sweatshop before he found a decent job.
sentences.cn: 他在一家血汗工厂做了三年才找到一份像样的工作.

sentences.en: Her boy has never been to a doctor or a dentist, and last bathed when he was 2, so a sweatshop job by comparison would be far more pleasant and less dangerous.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子从来没看过医生或者牙医，最后一次洗澡是在2岁的时候，所以两相对照，血汗工厂的工作将会开心的并且没有那么危险。

sentences.en: I can tell you a few things that we know a sweatshop.
sentences.cn: 我可告诉你我们所知道的一些情况.

sentences.en: While a factory job might not be great , he said, It'sweatshop.
sentences.cn: 他说, 工厂里的事情其实不怎么样,但那里也并非血汗工厂.

trans.tran_cn: 血汗工厂（指工人劳动条件差，工作时间长，工资低的工场或工厂）
trans.tran_en: a small business, factory etc where people work hard in bad conditions for very little money – used to show disapproval
